price: រីឯអ្នកណាដែលកោតខ្លាចការឈរនៅចំពោះមុខម្ចាស់ របស់គេ និងបានហាមឃាត់ខ្លួនពីការភ្លើតភ្លើននោះ
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفۡسَ عَنِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man khāfa maqāma rabbihi wanahā al-nafsa ʿani al-hawā
